response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 to us due to its unique features, superior materials, and the years of expertise poured into its creation. I am offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $13,000, providing you with an opportunity to own a piece of excellence at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further or if you have any questions about the product.", "product_price": 13000}
